mapper.update: update ps_pet set category_id = #{categoryId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, name = #{name,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, photo_urls = #{photoUrls,jdbcType=VARCHAR}, tags_id = #{tagsId,jdbcType=INTEGER}, status = #{status,jdbcType=VARCHAR} where id = #{id,jdbcType=INTEGER}
mapper.select: select id, category_id, name, photo_urls, tags_id, status from ps_pet
